entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy and freezing rain with risk of a thunderstorm. Local rainfall amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
